java112.analyzer

Class TokenSizeAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.TokenSizeAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer

    public class TokenSizeAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Analyzer
    This is the TokenSizeAnalyzer class that implements the interface: analyzer. It builds a list of unique tokens and their number of occurences from an inputed text file.
